doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
Fairview--Mountain Sunset--Mantel from Blair House cellar--Porch Room like Wakefield, Findowrie, Ash Lawn, & Temple Hill--Adapted into a bed and breakfast inn 1985

H-plan; 1 Story Brick: Hall-Parlor, 5 Course American Bond, Penciling, Ridge Board, Pitsaw Marks, Reciprocating Saw Marks, Split Rivens, Porch Room, 6 Panel Doors, 9/9, 6/6, Blinds; Hyphen was built later as alongitudinal passage to connect the two separate houses; Brick I-House: with Center Gable with Center Chimneys, Paired Column Portico, 3 Bay, Circular Saw Marks, Plaster Medallions, Graining, 2 Leaf Door, 4 Panel Doors, Transom with Sidelights, 2/2, Bay Window, Blinds
survey data: National Register of Historic Places--Virginia Landmarks Register--Architecture in Virginia
